import './index.css' const CounterItem = props => { const {commentDetails} = props const {id, name, comment, isLiked, initialClassName, date} = commentDetails const initial = name ? name[0].toUpperCase() : '' const likeTextClassName = isLiked ? 'button active' : 'button' const likeImageUrl = isLiked ? 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/comments-app/liked-img.png' : 'https://assets.ccbp.in/frontend/react-js/comments-app/like-img.png' const onClickLike = () => { const {toggleIsLiked} = props toggleIsLiked(id) } const onDeleteComment = () => { const {deleteComment} = props deleteComment(id) } return (

  • {initial}

    {name}

    {comment}

    • ) } export default CounterItem
